section.name: Open mapping file
section.p: When opening a Dozer-mapping-file the Dozer-editor appears. If you want to edit the raw XML you can switch to the "source" view.

section.name: Content Assist
section.p: All the class-a/class-b, field, get-method, set-method, etc -nodes or -attributes automaticly show content-assist popups when pressing ctrl+space or the configured WTP-XML content assist characters. These can be changed in the preferences.

section.name: Validation
section.p: The Dozer Plugin validates the Mapping to find out if the mapped class do exist and if the mapped fields are accessible.
